tags.name: chat-agent
tags.description:
`chat-agent`
`chatbot agent style chat widget`

Attributes:

  * `user-name` {`string`} - 

  * `user-picture` {`string`} - 

  * `maxlength` {`number`} - 

  * `developer-mode` {`boolean`} - 

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - 

  * `user-type-writer-speed` {`number`} - 

  * `merlin-type-writer-speed` {`number`} - 

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `userName` {`string`} - 

  * `userPicture` {`string`} - 

  * `promptCharacterLimit` {`number`} - 

  * `chatLog` {`never[]`} - 

  * `engine` {`string`} - 

  * `context` {`string`} - 

  * `isLoading` - 

  * `dataCollectionEnabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `buttonIcon` {`string`} - 

  * `buttonLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `developerModeEnabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `promptPlaceholder` {`string`} - 

  * `isFullView` {`boolean`} - 

  * `isInterfaceHidden` {`boolean`} - 

  * `merlinIndex` {`number`} - 

  * `messageIndex` {`number`} - 

  * `userIndex` {`number`} - 

  * `userTypeWriterSpeed` {`number`} - 

  * `merlinTypeWriterSpeed` {`number`} - 

  * `currentSuggestions` {`never[]`} - 

  * `isSiteEditorOpen` - 

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
`placeholder` {`string`} - 

Property: promptPlaceholder

Default: Enter your prompt here...

attributes.name: accent-color
attributes.description:
`accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

Property: accentColor

Default: grey

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description:
`dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Property: dark

Default: false
